R.I.P.D.2013.HDRip.NOSUBS.XVID.AC3-5.1.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time


Sources: 

Video: Russian 1080p WEB-Dl
Audio: SMY + Russian 5.1 Track
thx

Encode:

Finally the Russian Web-Dl came around has no subs unlike the chinese one.
Video had that typical yellowish colourtone, so had to fix that, also adjusted brightness,contrast,saturation
added sharpness and denoise

took the smy audio, cleaned it over and synced it to the Russian Video.

cleaned the russian 5.1 track from russian voice and embedded the smy audio in it

looks and sounds very perfect now almost retailish, all that nice special audio effects are now inside again

will do me till bluray
enjoy

Ps: yes i am around for whom it may concern, just very little time


Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1700 2pass
Audio: English AC3 5.1 @384
Sample: yes included
